fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If you are in the game, all players (including yourself) will receive another goal: eliminate your target AND your hitman at all costs. (Your hitman is defined as the player who has you as their target)
- Players will know their target's role, but not their name.
- Players will not know their hitman's role nor name.
- No player can be a target to multiple people, and informed minority members cannot have their target be someone they know is on their team. Nobody's target can be themselves.
- Lynching a target will only satisfy the win condition if the player voted the target.
- Eliminating one's hitman in any way will satisfy the win condition.
- If someone's target dies to someone that isn't themselves, their target's target is now their target.
- Your attack level is always one level higher than your target's defense level.
- Players win if they completely either of their goals.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Eliminate your target AND your hitman.
